sentences.sentence: Objectives To investigate the effect of the treatment of biliary ascarid with duodenoscopy.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨十二指肠镜治疗胆道蛔虫病的效果。

sentences.sentence: The results showed that the rate of the intestinal nematode infection is 13.79%, all are ascarid. The rate of pinworm infection is 8.87%.
sentences.translation: 调查发现厦门市儿童肠道线虫感染率为13.79%，全为蛔虫感染；蛲虫感染率为8.87%。

sentences.sentence: Results The child gastritis and peptic ulcer were easily misdiagnosed as bowel ascarid, gastroenteritis, dyspepsia, even mesentery scrofula etc.
sentences.translation: 结果小儿胃炎、消化性溃疡极易误诊为肠道蛔虫症、胃肠炎、消化不良甚至肠系膜淋巴结核等。
